column5: If you are interested in ice conditions on Abrams/Minnitaki Lakes in the Sioux Lookout area check out the web cam on their website. It is fishredpine.com. Looks like it is going fast.
http://www.fishredpine.com/webcam.htmlHere is the link for Red Pines webcam. Some signs of melting along the shore! Plus some weather info!
Thanks I wasn't sure how to do that.

He just got it up and running the other day. It was stuck in one picture for awhile. It was actually moved between cabin 1 and 2 for a day, that was a pretty cool picture. Its good to see the dock again, it was covered in a lot of snow until the last few days. I'll be up there in a few weeks, I'll be sure to wave to everyone as I go by the camera!

I've been monitoring this webcam for a week or so now. Is it me or do the water levels look really low? Is this normal until all the snow/ice melt? I've stayed at red pine for 14 years and only once or twice has that dock been sitting on the lake bed
I thought the same thing- I'm going to be up there the last week of May but at a different camp. It will be interesting to see what Abrams Chute looks like.
We've been going up there since 1985 and I don't think we have EVER seen that "dry-dock". They better have a LOT of snow to melt yet or hope for a very rainy Spring/Summer.
